item.title: Sam Altman goes before US Congress to propose licenses for building AI
item.description: - OpenAI CEO Sam Altman expresses concern about the use of AI to interfere with election integrity and calls for regulation and guidelines to be put in place.

item.title: JPMorgan Chase & Co tracks employees to dystopian extents
item.description: - JPMorgan Chase & Co's employee surveillance tool called WADU has raised concerns among employees and potential hires.

item.title: Widely used chemical strongly linked to Parkinson's disease
item.description: - Exposure to the chemical solvent trichloroethylene (TCE) increases the risk of Parkinson's disease, according to an epidemiological study published in JAMA Neurology.

item.title: Apple previews Live Speech, Personal Voice, & more new accessibility features
item.description: - Apple previews new software features for users with cognitive, vision, hearing, and mobility accessibility.

item.title: A guidance language for controlling LLMs
item.description: - Guidance is a new program for controlling Language Model Controllers, with efficient language model control, API-based chat models, and smart seed-based generation caching.

item.title: The Sourdough Framework
item.description: - The Sourdough Framework is an open-source book that provides a framework for making the best sourdough bread at home - The book gives information on the natural fermentation process with scientific references to help bakers in different environments - The book can be built locally or downloaded in PDF, EPUB, MOBI, or AZW3 versions, and readers can contribute to improving the book via Github or donate to support the author.

item.title: Bun 0.6
item.description: - The release of Bun 0.6 features a built-in JavaScript and TypeScript bundler and minifier for bundling frontend apps or bundling code to a standalone executable.

item.title: Seaflooding
item.description: - Seaflooding is a method to combat rising sea levels caused by climate change while providing economic benefits and new habitats.

item.title: CS 61B Data Structures, Spring 2023 UC Berkeley
item.description: - CS 61B Data Structures course is offering a spring session in 2023 with instructors Josh Hug and Justin Yokota.

item.title: Farmland practices are driving bird population decline across Europe
item.description: - This website is best experienced by visiting the website directly.
